explains: n. 一连串（不愉快的事物）；（河水）猛涨；洪水；大雨

sentences.en: The bombing was the latest in a spate of terrorist attacks.
sentences.cn: 这次炸弹爆炸事件是一连串恐怖主义袭击中最近的一起。

sentences.en: A spate of strikes has thrown a spanner into the workshop of the world.
sentences.cn: 一连串的罢工已给这个世界工厂带来了麻烦。

sentences.en: After heavy rain, the river was in spate.
